definitions.definition: A person who advocates populism (a movement against ruling elites who are presumed not to act in the interests of the ordinary citizen).
A politician who advocates specific policies just because they are popular .
A person who advocates democratic principles.

main_definition: A person who advocates populism (a movement against ruling elites who are presumed not to act in the interests of the ordinary citizen).
secondary_definitions: A politician who advocates specific policies just because they are popular .
